type.description: Property. NGSI Entity type. It has to be Device

ipAddress.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. List of IP address of the device. It can be a comma separated list of values if the device has more than one IP address

dateInstalled.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/DateTime'. A timestamp which denotes when the device was installed (if it requires installation)

PrometheusMetricsScraping_interval.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/DateTime'. A timestamp which denote the interval of scraping of the data interval

hardwareInformationScraped.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/DateTime'. A timestamp which denotes when the device capabilites scrapped

dateFirstUsed.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/DateTime'. A timestamp which denotes when the device was first used

hardwareVersion.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. The hardware version of this device

softwareVersion.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. The software version of this device

osVersion.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. The version of the host operating system device

relativePosition.description: Property. Location of this device in a coordinate system according to its local emplacement

dateLastCalibration.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/DateTime'. A timestamp which denotes when the last calibration of the device happened

serialNumber.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/serialNumber'. The serial number assigned by the manufacturer

provider.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/provider'. The provider of the device

deviceState.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. State of this device from an operational point of view. Its value can be vendor dependent

dateLastValueReported.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/DateTime'. A timestamp which denotes the last time when the device successfully reported data to the cloud

value.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/QuantitativeValue'. A observed or reported value. For actuator devices, it is an attribute that allows a controlling application to change the actuation setting. For instance, a switch device which is currently _on_ can report a value 'on' of type 'Text'. Obviously, in order to toggle the referred switch, this attribute value will have to be changed to 'off'
